result.eng: I'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ga: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.orig: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.html: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ponchtml: Laḃróiḋ mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.

result.eng: Do you have time?
result.ga: An bhfuil am agat
result.orig: An bhfuil am agat
result.html: An bhfuil am agatDo you have time?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil am agatDo you have time?

result.eng: Are we in time for the meeting?
result.ga: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniú
result.orig: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniú
result.html: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil muid in am don ċruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?

result.eng: You will be wemcome anytime.
result.ga: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bith
result.orig: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bith
result.html: Beidh fáilte romhat am ar bithYou will be wemcome anytime.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ fáilte roṁat am ar biṫYou will be wemcome anytime.

result.eng: I'll be gone by that time.
result.ga: Beidh mé imithe faoin am sin
result.orig: Beidh mé imithe faoin am sin
result.html: Beidh mé imithe faoin am sinI'll be gone by that time.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé imiṫe faoin am sinI'll be gone by that time.

result.eng: You will be gone by that time.
result.ga: Beidh tú imithe faoin am sin
result.orig: Beidh tú imithe faoin am sin
result.html: Beidh tú imithe faoin am sinYou will be gone by that time.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú imiṫe faoin am sinYou will be gone by that time.

result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: We were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ga: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.orig: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baile
result.html: Bhí muid traochta faoin am a shroich muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid traoċta faoin am a ẛroiċ muid an baileWe were exhausted by the time we reached the town.

result.eng: I help her from time to time.
result.ga: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.orig: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go ham
result.html: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag cuidiú léi ó am go hamI help her from time to time.

result.eng: The restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ga: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.orig: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.html: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an ḃialann gnóṫaċ go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.

result.eng: She detained the children after school.
result.ga: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.orig: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.html: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoileShe detained the children after school.
result.ponchtml: Ċoimeád sí na páistí i ndiaiḋ am scoileShe detained the children after school.

result.eng: It will be done in its own proper time.
result.ga: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.orig: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.html: Déanfar in am agus i dtráth éIt will be done in its own proper time.
result.ponchtml: Déanfar in am agus i dtráṫ éIt will be done in its own proper time.

result.eng: By the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ga: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.orig: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse orm
result.html: Faoin am a shroich mé an ceann scríbe bhí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.
result.ponchtml: Faoin am a ẛroiċ mé an ceann scríbe ḃí tuirse ormBy the time I had reached the destination I was tired.

result.eng: I can't be there in time.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom bheith ann in am
result.orig: Ní féidir liom bheith ann in am
result.html: Ní féidir liom bheith ann in amI can't be there in time.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom ḃeiṫ ann in amI can't be there in time.

result.eng: I hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ga: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.orig: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seo
result.html: Ní raibh am ceart agam le tabhairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ am ceart agam le taḃairt faoi go dtí seoI hadn't had any proper time to get down to it until now.

result.eng: It happened in past times.
result.ga: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.orig: Tharla sé sin san am atá caite
result.html: Tharla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé sin san am atá caiteIt happened in past times.

result.eng: It is time for me to leave.
result.ga: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.orig: Tá sé in am dom imeacht
result.html: Tá sé in am dom imeachtIt is time for me to leave.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in am dom imeaċtIt is time for me to leave.

result.eng: I go to the pub from time to time.
result.ga: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go ham
result.orig: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go ham
result.html: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go hamI go to the pub from time to time.
result.ponchtml: Téim go dtí an pub ó am go hamI go to the pub from time to time.

result.eng: It is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.
result.ga: Tá sé in am do Mhícheál agus do Shiubhán dul abhaile
result.orig: Tá sé in am do Mhícheál agus do Shiubhán dul abhaile
result.html: Tá sé in am do Mhícheál agus do Shiubhán dul abhaileIt is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé in am do Ṁíċeál agus do Ṡiuḃán dul aḃaileIt is time for Mícheál and Siubhán to go home.

result.eng: We will see you some other time.
result.ga: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eile
result.orig: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eile
result.html: Feicfidh muid sibh am éicint eileWe will see you some other time.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ muid siḃ am éicint eileWe will see you some other time.

result.eng: What do you do when you have free time?
result.ga: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agat
result.orig: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agat
result.html: Céard a dhéanann tú nuair a bhíonn am saor agatWhat do you do when you have free time?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ḋéanann tú nuair a ḃíonn am saor agatWhat do you do when you have free time?

result.eng: What does Aisling do when she has free time?

result.ponchtml: Céard a ḋéanann Aisling nuair a ḃíonn am saor aiciWhat does Aisling do when she has free time?

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ga: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.orig: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.html: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃíonn am agam iṫe fiú aṁáinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.eng: We are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
result.ga: Bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den am

result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid sa leaḃarlann agus sa saoṫarlann an ċuid is mó den amWe are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh

result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: Twitter, the choice means of communication in fashion right now.

result.eng: From this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ga: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.orig: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nua
result.html: As an am seo amach b'iad sclábhaithe formhór mór na ndaoine gorma a facthas san Eoraip agus sa domhan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.
result.ponchtml: As an am seo amaċ b'iad scláḃaiṫe forṁór mór na ndaoine gorma a facṫas san Eoraip agus sa doṁan nuaFrom this time onward, most black people seen in Europe and the new world were slaves.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
